channel.title: Posts on Allen Ma's Website
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Allen Ma's Website

item.title: New Year - New Website
item.description: Still using Hugo to generate my sites and the same-old hand-rolled CSS. Hopefully, I’ll be posting more about my excursions in machine-learning over January. This site also supports LaTeX via MathJax $${\sqrt {n}}\left(\left({\frac {1}{n}}\sum _{i=1}^{n}X_{i}\right)-\mu \right)\ {\xrightarrow {d}}\ N\left(0,\sigma ^{2}\right)$$ Syntax higlighting via highlight.js - neat, woohoo, yay! /s def hello_world(): print("this is neat") Another feature: if you have an image, it automatically gets centered, like the Github Octocat below:
